meanings.definition: Used to attract attention or express surprise or joy.
meanings.sent1: Hulloa! Look at the rainbow in the sky!
meanings.sent2: When I saw my friend after a long time, I exclaimed, 'Hulloa!'
meanings.sent3: Hulloa! I found a cookie in my pocket, what a delightful surprise!
meanings.sent4: The news of the victory made the crowd hulloa with happiness.
meanings.sent5: As the magician pulled a rabbit out of his hat, the audience hulloaed in amazement.

meanings.definition: To call out loudly or shout.
meanings.sent1: I hulloaed for help when I got lost in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The coach hulloaed instructions to the players on the field.
meanings.sent3: The children hulloaed with excitement as the ice cream truck approached.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm hulloaed through the night, waking everyone up.
meanings.sent5: The protesters hulloaed slogans demanding change outside the government building.
